text.__SUMMARY__:
Passiflora guatemalensis,  the Guatemala passion vine, is a species in the family Passifloraceae.   It is native to Guatemala, and found from southern Mexico through Central America to Venezuela.Passiflora guatemalensis is a species that can grow large, has purple undersides on the 'decorative' leaves, and white flowers.  It is planted in conservatories and subtropical gardens.
